prompts.frontCover:
Flat 2D illustration for a greeting card front cover, beautiful watercolor painting style with soft edges and a lighthearted, funny tone.

The scene is a comical and chaotic day at a sunny beach. In the foreground, illustrated cartoon versions of Lao Lao and Jordan from the reference photo are having a sandcastle-building competition gone wrong. Lao Lao, wearing her light blue sweatshirt and black pants, is laughing gleefully, holding a small toy shovel as she triumphantly places a seashell on top of her lopsided, wobbly sandcastle. Jordan, in his brown hoodie and dark pants, is looking on with a playfully exasperated expression, his own sandcastle having just been comically washed away by a small, mischievous wave, leaving only a wet puddle where it stood.

The beach around them is full of humorous details: a crab wearing a tiny birthday party hat scurries by, carrying a miniature balloon. A goofy-looking seagull is attempting to steal a hotdog from an abandoned beach blanket nearby. The sky is bright blue with fluffy, whimsical clouds, and the ocean has gentle, turquoise waves.

Centered in the middle of the composition, in a clear space above the characters, is the text "Happy Birthday, Lao Lao!" written in a beautiful, flowing, dark blue handwritten cursive script.

REFINEMENT NOTE: A rough draft of this exact image is provided as reference. Create a high-quality final version that:
- Maintains the exact same composition, character positions, and overall design
- Enhances details, textures, and color vibrancy
- Corrects any minor imperfections or artifacts
- Adds professional polish while staying true to the draft
- Think of this as the "final art" version of the provided sketch

ORIGINAL CONTEXT TO MAINTAIN:
- To: Lao Lao
- From: Jordan
- Relationship: Lao Lao is Jordan's girlfriend
- Personal Traits to incorporate: beach
- Reference photos of: lao lao on left, jordan on rgith
prompts.backCover: Minimalist flat 2D illustration for the back cover of a greeting card. Beautiful watercolor painting style with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. The design features a delicate, solitary seashell and a single small starfish resting on a soft, sandy-colored watercolor wash at the bottom of the card. The upper portion of the card is a gentle fade into a soft sky blue watercolor wash. The overall composition is very sparse, clean, and elegant, covering about 20% of the panel, with the bottom-right corner intentionally left clear and empty. The artwork is subtle, using the color palette from the front cover.
prompts.leftInterior: Flat 2D illustration for the left interior panel of a greeting card. Beautiful watercolor painting style with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. A serene beach scene continuing the theme from the front cover, but without any characters or figures. The bottom half of the panel is a gentle wash of sandy beach color, leading into turquoise and light blue ocean waves with soft white foam. The sky above is a pale, bright blue with a few soft, fluffy watercolor clouds. This decorative artwork covers about 40% of the panel, providing a calm, scenic backdrop that complements the front cover's energy.
prompts.rightInterior:
Flat 2D illustration for the right interior panel of a greeting card, designed to hold a written message. Beautiful watercolor painting style with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. The design is minimal, featuring a subtle decorative border along the bottom edge. This border is a simple, elegant wash of soft sandy beach watercolor, with a few small, artistically rendered seashells scattered lightly. The top 80% of the panel is a clean, bright, off-white space with a very light paper texture, creating an open and inviting area perfect for a heartfelt message. The decoration is minimal and confined to the bottom to avoid distracting from the text.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "To my favorite person, Lao Lao,

Happy Birthday! I was going to get you a super expensive gift, but then I remembered you already have me. You're welcome! I love doing life with you, even when you steal all the blankets.

All my love,
Jordan"
